entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is described as being near a hedge, torn between amusement and anxiety. He is also mentioned as grinning and chuckling throughout the passage.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is mentioned as looking up to see Percy's head poking out of a window on the second floor. He is also described as directing tables safely onto the grass with Bill.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as having his head poking out of a window on the second floor and bellowing at Bill to keep it down. He is also mentioned as slamming the window shut.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley's excellent cooking is described in the passage.

entities.name: the weasleys
entities.description: The nine Weasleys are mentioned as being present at the gathering.

entities.name: billâ€™s table
entities.description: Bill's table is described as being knocked off its leg and then reattached by Bill.

entities.name: cauldron bottoms
entities.description: Cauldron bottoms are mentioned as being worked on by Percy.

relationships.description: Bill and Percy interact with each other through a series of conversations, with Bill apologizing to Percy for the noise and Percy responding peevishly.
Charlie collaborates with Bill in directing tables safely onto the grass.
Percy is working on cauldron bottoms, as mentioned by Bill.
Bill repairs the table leg that was knocked off.
